original_text: After all this, when Josiah had set the temple in order, Necho king of Egypt went up to fight at Carchemish on the Euphrates, and Josiah marched out to meet him in battle.
korean_text: 이 모든 일 후 곧 요시야가 성전을 정돈하기를 마친 후에 애굽 왕 느고가 유브라데 강 가의 갈그미스를 치러 올라왔으므로 요시야가 나가서 방비하였더니

sentences.original_text: when Josiah had set the temple in order
Necho king of Egypt went up to fight
and Josiah marched out to meet him in battle
